Keywords: Guardians of the Galaxy , Pirate , Ravagers , Wakanda
Real Name: T'Challa
Special Powers
LET ME INTRODUCE YOU TO THE FAMILY I MADE ALONG THE WAY: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Minions of Thanos, Ravagers, or Wakanda keyword gain the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword.
WAKANDAN BORN, RAVAGER TRAINED: Energy Shield/Deflection, Super Senses.

Comments
June 19, 2022
Maxphyte
Would have been a very simple and very effective piece for what he was designed for in the previous rule set. Still not an efficient move to have your 100 point figure put themselves into the fray just to ping figures 1 damage instead of just staying at full range and straight up cripple the opposing team’s best figure.
May 29, 2022
Brundun94
Honestly, multi target pulsewave has been making a difference in casual games for me lately, and likely *could* in competitive, since the game has firmly pivoted away from tentpoles, minus legacy Thanos. Running in and knocking 30 - 60 point figures off their starting clicks can really prove to be a monumental setback for your opponent. 100 pts is still probably a little too much for this guy to be fringe, but in sealed, and in many casual arenas, he's probably going to have a surprising effect.
May 27, 2022
Bobcat2022
Y’know, I figured I’d only ever use this piece at his lower point line for keyword shenanigans, but sometimes Sealed changes your plans. Marvel Studios Disney+ isn’t handing out the opening 12 attack/4 damage stats as readily as some recent sets, and when I could use other figures to keep opposing pieces from closing the gap, he earned his 100 points.
May 3, 2022
Goop
Pulse wave on high cost characters are a think of the past, i'm kinda surprised that gave that to Panther here. I'm sure he will see play for keyword sharing but he is far FAR better on his lower line.
